contentList.content: When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance also increases by 50%.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> is doubled for Deception and Performance <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
You have become a true thespian. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> is doubled for Deception and Performance <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Heavy Armour.
